tier.item: Also, in Bella Coola, the deictic proclitic associated with the modifying noun must always agree
with the clitics associated with its head--thus, *k©xic tastaltmx tiimlktx and *k©xic tistaltmx cixnascx
(cf. k©xic cistaltmx cixnascx `I see the woman who is chief'). This is undoubtedly also connected to the
loss of semantic referentiality of nouns in modifier position, non-referential items not being amenable to
50 TOR ONTO WOR K I NG P A P E R S I N LI NGUI S T I C S
